name: AnkushCoach
0:
”Alexa, open ankush dot coach”
”what is the significance of sun in eighth house”
”What are divisional charts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ankush dot coach
des:
Ankush.Coach is an Astrology learning skill for new Astrology learners, semi-professionals, and experienced professionals. Ankush.Coach skill comes handy when you quickly want answers to simple questions like, "What are the characteristics of Mercury," or more advance questions related to Nakshatras or Yogas in Vedic astrology. This skill works as Astrology Flashcards for everyone, to have a quick reference to huge Astrology question Data bank we maintain. Do choose English (IN) as a Language option in your Alexa device to get the best experience, though skill would work in other English Regional settings as well. 

It is curated by Ankush Wadhwa, who is an Astrologer with 20+ years of experience and the founder of www.ankush.coach, a platform to improve your happiness quotient, through Astrology, lifestyle, wellness, and happiness coaching & learning. It's a scientific way of planning the next steps in your life, where the probability of happening an event is already known to a large extent. 

If you are not able to find your set of questions or want to share your feedback/suggestions, write in directly to Ankush Wadhwa on contact@ankush.coach. You may also visit www.ankush.coach
